Notes: Business Nominal Rate: 12.53%. Customer Margin: 12.03%. EAR means Effective Annual Rate.  We provide the EAR to enable you to make comparisons against other overdraft products. To calculate the EAR we take both your interest rate margin and current Bank of England Base Rate, which you are charged on your overdraft and compound it every month over a year. The EAR does not include any fees or charges which apply to your overdraft.  It also does not take account of any future Base Rate changes. Representative EAR - Representative Effective Annual Rate  is the advertised rate (or a lower rate) we reasonably expect at least 51% of customers who are accepted for and enter into the overdraft agreement as a result of the advertising or marketing will get. The rep EAR does not include any future Bank of England Base Rate changes.
Fees and interest are debited to your current account on the Bank's usual charging dates (available on request) either monthly or quarterly in line with your current account tariff
Fees and interest are debited to your current account on the Bank's usual charging dates (available on request) either monthly or quarterly in line with your current account tariff

TradingHistoryEligibility.Textual: This account is suitable for  businesses that have a turnover between £5m and £6.5m per annum. We have specific criteria for businesses in certain sectors so please call us on 0800 515 4622 to discuss the best way we can support your business.

This account is suitable for  businesses that have a turnover between £5m and £6.5m per annum. We have specific criteria for businesses in certain sectors so please call us on 0800 515 4622 to discuss the best way we can support your business.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Online Banking
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Do your daily banking when it suits you, whether you're at the office, at meetings or on holiday. Barclays Online Banking is quick, safe and convenient.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Mobile Banking
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Manage your finances on the move with your mobile or tablet. Add a new payee, make payments, check your balance and more. It’s simple and secure.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: CloudIt
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Get rid of paperwork clutter and store all of your important documents safely and securely in CloudIt.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Barclays Collect
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Secure collection of your cash and cheques so you can focus on running your business.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Mobile payments
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Get paid instantly into your account with Pingit mobile payment collections.

Notes: PingIt
You might be subject to an automated credit fee charged at your agreed tariff.
£25 via manual/online banking , £15 via Barclays.Net/BIB. Customers may also be subject to an automated debit fee charged at your agreed tariff.
£15 via Barclays.Net/BIB, £25 via manual/online banking. Customers may also be subject to an automated debit fee charged at your agreed tariff.
£15 via Branch / Telephony, £5 via electronic channels
£5 via electronic channels, £15 via Branch / Telephony
£25 via Branch / Telephony, £15 via electronic channels.
£15 via electronic channels, £25 via Branch / Telephony.
Per £100
Plus VAT
Plus VAT
Unpaid Transaction Fee.

CoreProduct.ProductDescription: The Barclays Business Tariff has been specially designed to meet the everday banking needs of established businesses that have a turnover between £5m and £6.5m per annum.

CoreProduct.ProductDescription: The Community Account has been specially designed to meet the needs of clubs, charities,societies and other forms of associations. The Community Account is for non-profit making organisations that will benefit their local community.

Notes: Business Nominal Rate: 12.53%. Customer Margin: 12.03%. EAR means Effective Annual Rate.  We provide the EAR to enable you to make comparisons against other overdraft products. To calculate the EAR we take both your interest rate margin and current Bank of England Base Rate, which you are charged on your overdraft and compound it every month over a year. The EAR does not include any fees or charges which apply to your overdraft.  It also does not take account of any future Base Rate changes. Representative EAR - Representative Effective Annual Rate  is the advertised rate (or a lower rate) we reasonably expect at least 51% of customers who are accepted for and enter into the overdraft agreement as a result of the advertising or marketing will get. The rep EAR does not include any future Bank of England Base Rate changes.
Fees and interest are debited to your current account on the Bank's usual charging dates (available on request) either monthly or quarterly in line with your current account tariff
Fees and interest are debited to your current account on the Bank's usual charging dates (available on request) either monthly or quarterly in line with your current account tariff

TradingHistoryEligibility.Textual: This account is suitable for most businesses that have a turnover of up to £5m. We have specific criteria for businesses in certain sectors so please call us on 0800 515 4622 to discuss the best way we can support your business.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Loyalty Reward
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: We pay you back a proportion of the charges we apply to your current account on a monthly basis. It’s our way of rewarding you for being our customer.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Online Banking
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Do your daily banking when it suits you, whether you're at the office, at meetings or on holiday. Barclays Online Banking is quick, safe and convenient.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Mobile Banking
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Manage your finances on the move with your mobile or tablet. Add a new payee, make payments, check your balance and more. It’s simple and secure.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: CloudIt
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Get rid of paperwork clutter and store all of your important documents safely and securely in CloudIt.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Start-up 12 Month Free Banking
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Start-up business account free business banking for the first 12 months.  Get your business off the ground with free banking for the first 12 months.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Barclays Collect
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Secure collection of your cash and cheques so you can focus on running your business.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Mobile payments
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Get paid instantly into your account with Pingit mobile payment collections.

Notes: PingIt
£25 via manual/online banking , £15 via Barclays.Net/BIB
£15 via Barclays.Net/BIB, £25 via manual/online banking
£15 via Branch / Telephony, £5 via electronic channels
£5 via electronic channels, £15 via Branch / Telephony
£25 via Branch / Telephony, £15 via electronic channels.
£15 via electronic channels, £25 via Branch / Telephony.
Per £100
Plus VAT
Plus VAT
Unpaid Transaction Fee
